title: please use hyper link instead of release pdf documents in binary distribution
body:
To reduce binary distribution file size, only godoc related html still require to put
in.  Other pdf or unrelated document should removed from binary distribution, just use
hyper link instead.

And, suggest add some links in 'doucments' page:
 * contrib.html
 * ExpressivenessOfGo.pdf (its code are before Go1)
 * describe windows utf-8 platform on install.html, ref: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9611931

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
go.weekly.2012-03-13.windows-386.zip
